item.text: The angelic messenger who had been speaking with me then returned and woke me, as a person is wakened from sleep.

He <st data-num="0559 0413">asked</st> me, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> do <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st>?” I <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “I <st data-num="07200 02009">see</st> a <st data-num="04501" class="">menorah</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">pure</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> with a <st data-num="01543" class="">receptacle</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st>. There are <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st>, with <st data-num="07651 07651">seven</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="04166" class="">pipes</st> going to the <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st>.

There are also <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02132" class="">olive trees</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">beside</st> it, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> on the <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> of the <st data-num="01543" class="">receptacle</st> and the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st>.”<n id="1" />

Then I <st data-num="06030 0559 0413 0559">asked</st> the <st data-num="04397" class="">messenger</st> who <st data-num="01696">spoke</st> with me, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> are <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0113" class="">sir</st>?”

<st data-num="04397 01696">He</st> <st data-num="06030 0559 0413">replied</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="01992">are</st>?” So I <st data-num="0559" class="">responded</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="0113" class="">sir</st>.”
Therefore he told me, “This is the Lord’s message to Zerubbabel: ‘Not by strength and not by power, but by my Spirit,’ says the Lord of Heaven’s Armies.
“What are you, you great mountain? Because of Zerubbabel you will become a level plain! And he will bring forth the temple capstone with shoutings of ‘Grace! Grace!’ because of this.”
Moreover, the Lord’s message came to me as follows:
“The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundations of this temple, and his hands will complete it. Then you will know that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies has sent me to you.

For who dares make light of small beginnings? These seven eyes will joyfully look on the tin tablet in Zerubbabel’s hand. These are the eyes of the Lord, which constantly range across the whole earth.”
Next I asked the messenger, “What are these two olive trees on the right and the left of the menorah?”

Before he could reply I <st data-num="06030 0559 0413">asked</st> <st data-num="08145" class="">again</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> are these <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07641" class="">extensions</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="02132" class="">olive trees</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> are <st data-num="07324 05921">emptying out</st> the <st data-num="02091" class="">golden</st> oil <st data-num="03027" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">golden</st> <st data-num="06804" class="">pipes</st>?”

He <st data-num="0559 0413 0559">replied</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> are?” And I <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st>, <st data-num="0113" class="">sir</st>.”
So he said, “These are the two anointed ones who stand by the Lord of the whole earth.”
